topic.title: ZeroSeed: a 24h 7d ALWAYS ONLINE node for ZeroNet!
topic.body:
Feel free to publish here your new zite! I will help you to share with all the network with an always online node! I hope this will help the zeronet community to grow! :)  I will publish any content except illegal zites (i will not share piracy, racism, black markets, pedo, terrorism, etc...). I will not discriminate any site for having different ideas from mine

If you will see an illegal site posted here feel free to report it in this forum, i will remove it from my node.

This service is designed for zites that have few nodes online to help them to collect more nodes; when your zite will be well seeded i will remove it from the service.

This service is FOR FREE!!! :) ...What are you waiting for? :)

http://127.0.0.1:43110/16S6TbXHQQzpBy1qjW3cspKeCxUfhWnheD/

topic.title: make a proxy for zeronet
topic.body:
I want to configure also a read-only proxy in my vps for clearnet for the zites that i'm seeding but i need some help to configure it:

-there are written instructions anywere to make a public zeronet proxy?
-i want to share more than 10 MB per zite. is that possible?
-i want to share only legit zites (i must choose the zites to proxy and block all others, users must not access any zite that i don't want)
-anyone must not be able to create users on the proxy or block anyone using zeroid
-anyone must not be allowed to post any content from the proxy 

is possible to make all these things?

topic.title: Zeronet against internet overload due to coronavirus
topic.body:
Due to coronavirus quarantine, many people are staying at home and are overusing internet; because of this the entire network could collape due to high traffic. As countermeasure some clearnet sites like youtube and netflix are stopping streaming HD definition videos. 

https://edition.cnn.com/2020/03/19/tech/netflix-internet-overload-eu/index.html

...but probably the easist thing will be allow users to save videos in their local disk instead download every time! :D (but by allowing this also piracy will be easies and none will see my banners...because of this internet must die and people use a downgraded service!)

The alternative is Zeronet! On IFS (and in all other zites) every peer download content only one time and seed it to the entire network distributing the overload more properly! There are many movies on IFS right now! (Also HD videos! :D ) What do you waiting for? Begin to seed and having fun!

http://127.0.0.1:43110/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er/

topic.body:
I'd doing a streaming test with StreamZ over TOR with a very low resolution (144p) and it works! 

Doing this with TOR for me is a great result! If we can stream audio very probably we can create anonymous radio in ZeroNet!

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BTZh5pymEKzMYr3qgDtgr4dMmap77QvEs/?/watch/1D15kTr44qdACPNLAgAnatTmDY2CW1MCpQ/xttahpt3hi/streaming%20test%20under%20TOR

topic.body:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BTZh5pymEKzMYr3qgDtgr4dMmap77QvEs/?/watch/1H2N6dZVCZ4rD4ZQsmQjJPWTq2BCipV2Hq/2e7s8covfhq/test%20without%20TOR

topic.title: StreanZ test results: WE NEED AUDIO SUPPORT!!!
topic.body:
In my tests, by using a 20 Mb ADSL connection, i successfully did a 144p stream behind TOR and a 240p stream without TOR (by using an higher bitrate the zite didn't work). 

I used a 10 s delay in all tests.

144p = 256x144 bitrate: 110 kbps
240p = 426x240 bitrate: 245 kbps

As we know StreamZ actually don't support audio streaming, but these tests show that audio streaming will be possible also under TOR by using  an ADSL connection like mine (in Italy ADSL is very slow, higher performances can be reached in the rest of the world)

By using a VPS or a small dedicated server the zite don't work because require also a lot of CPU.

WE SHOULD IMPLEMENT AUDIO STREAMING ON STREAMZ! This will allow anyone to stream anonymously a private radio and can be very useful in some country like China for real-time communications

topic.title: Zeronet over LAN, Bluetooth and WiFi networks. The example from Briar
topic.body:
Recently i tried Briar, a P2P software capable to send messages over TOR, WiFi and Bluetooth. This approach have great advantages instead using only clearnet and TOR connections:

- more fast sync from local devices (useful if you connect on zeronet from different devices in your home)
- less use of resources of global network to create local copies because local peers can connect directly each others without use external nodes
- zeronet will sync with local peers also during internet blackouts
- more anonymous if zeronet is used to communicate locally because nothing go on internet

This is a good idea? What do you think?

topic.title: Topics about ZeroNet is banned on clearnet
topic.body: I tried to talk to ZeroNet on various sites on clearnet but almost all times my topics are banned for a reason (spam , dangerous links, etc...). Maybe centralized systems are feared by the competition given by decentralized ones?  (for example paid/ads services vs decentralized free services) Or people are feared by this uncontrolled anarchy? This censor happens only to me?

1581976802_1CcmrTeqtuoQtUpuxBZ9wFZz1tPaB.body:
I copy here the rules for hosting your zite on my new proxy (the same as the previous):

This is a preview with selected zites (all official zerotalks plus some other zites) created to show zeronet to the public. This is a read-only proxy and addictional zites cannot be added by users. Also ZeroID and login zites are blocked (you can't comment any zite by using the proxy, you should install zeronet in your pc/phone to do this). Private content zites like zeromail are also blocked.

If you want your zite added to this proxy it must respect these conditions, if this is the case post your link in a comment below:

legal content (no pedo, black markets, malware, piracy, racism, etc... the same rules of my seedbox are valid also here) no javascript cryptominers
no image previews of user generated content (example: Millchan) 
no big files, no videos/audio files (this files use a large amount of bandwidth and can block the proxy)
no private content (zites like zeromail) , cannot be managed by using the proxy. 
No zites that allow user login in their code without using a third part service like ZeroID (example: Millchan)

I will not discriminate any site for having different ideas from mine.

If you will see an illegal site in the proxy feel free to report it in this forum, i will remove it from the site.

I'm doing this because i LOVE the philosophy described by zeronet creator in this video: https://www.ted.com/talks/tamas_kocsis_the_case_for_a_decentralized_internet

I will do as possible i can to realize this dream!

> [cexy](#comment_65_1Fjz1g7unEcMnTRy7nc9WUBZdA7eHkc7BL): You are not serious. I was thinking that astronomers are needed here over last few days. What do you want to do and what do you need?

:D :D :D For many years i analyzed medical images by using some software to find "hidden informations" in them. I want to try to do the same with images taken in other fields (very often medical images have a low resolution and are difficult to interpreter, i want try to resolve also this problem with this idea). more informations about these techniques here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radiomics

None that i know on clearnet and real life are really interested and want to spent time on this...maybe here someone exist?

> [astrav](#comment_57_1Cz14BpPcFkhe8R2cEqHuCfEgRymfaSLH8): Do you have some photographs to share on zn?

i think to use public domain pics like NASA ones...because of this i told astronomy. i can elaborate thse pics...but someone should tell what he see...i'm not an astronomer. any other public domain pic should be ok. i will upload thet with my elaborations on IFS

> [a2llfd](#comment_13_17HQ27P8LgqS7S4WAUy9bRQtPoESLA15Cx): How about You displaying some code first and then people can evaluate, whether that project is even worth joining. Good software developers do not want to just work for free for someone else. You have to offer something in return and that something that GOOD software developers accept tends to be something other than social interaction and "grand vision". Sorry, no free work for You or for anybody else! We've got our own projects to work on already.

Maybe i dont explain well. I dont write any code and i dont want to sell anything. I want only to try a software that i m using on medical images with non medical ones and publish result for free. You dont do anything... Only take these free data, use it and told me if that tech can be useful for you, sharing what you see to help me to understand what Im seeding on medical images elaborated in the same manner. (you can also take my free data and do all you want with them). Why Im doing this? Only for curiosità and to help società in general (the same motivation that bring me to create zeronet seedboxes and proxy). Not always good tech can create Money and not always what dont bring to personal gain is useful to society

> [a2llfd](#comment_16_17HQ27P8LgqS7S4WAUy9bRQtPoESLA15Cx): What are You looking for from those medical images? What type of images are they? What's the purpose of the analysis? Please be more specific.

the main problem with radiomics is that we don't understand what all indicators that extrapolate from images "means". We call all these indicators "inhomogeneity" because "inhomogeneity" of tumor lesions correlate with prognosis (if a tumor is inhomogeneous is probably more aggressive) but standard deviation (SD) for example is totally different from entropy. These 2 indicators are both "inhomogeneity" indicators...but are totally different and we don't know how! To resolve that problem scientists now are using AI systems to correlate all these indicators (100+ variables calculated with different methods) to prognosis instead using the scientific method. Nowdays these  clinical studies have a very simple design: 
collect data- > put in AI -> publish result! 

instead  scientific method should:
collect data -> do an hypothesis -> create an experiment to confirm or reject it -> conclusions

If we don't know how an image with "high entropy" differs from another one with "high SD"...we can't do a proper hypothesis! (these hypothesis should be done by LOOKING IMAGES BEFORE CREATING THE EXPERIMENT!) Without a proper design all studies are failing when applied to specific patient, also because very often the sample used to extract data or train AI are biased and not homogeneous (different diseases included, different stages, low numerosity...you can see AI studies DONE WITH 10 (TEN) PATIENT published on journals with high impact factor!)

My proposal is to create parametric images where the distributions of this indicators are mapped to try to understand how these variables appears on common non-medical images and in known medical ones (free archives of astronomers are the best for doing this) to try to understand VISUALLY how indicators are affected from the appearance of the images used as input. Parametric images can be done pixel by pixel for example calculating SD from an area surrounding every pixel within a certain diameter (kernel). Obviously i can't analyze non medical images because i'm not a specialist of that images...but with the help of someone we can share the data and maybe i can answer my questions and who will help me can find novel data from the images that we will use that our methods will bring to the surface. all we can gain something by doing this!

> [cexy](#comment_66_1Fjz1g7unEcMnTRy7nc9WUBZdA7eHkc7BL): If you want I have ideas for a blog article or video about mars and earth secrets that most people don't know.

...you can explain to me your ideas if you want and link me some images to analyze. use zeromail if you want to contact me in private

Thanks for the answer. i'm happy to find people  that want to help me. thanks to zeronet this now is possible.

Anyway as i told before i'm a doctor, not a programmer (and during the COVID emergency i must help patients before doing anything, i don't have time and energy to follow a too big project). I'm not able toi write code, but instead i learned during years of direct experience to use software already done by others in other fields to analyze medical data. I'm in contact with a medical department and maybe i can return to use its data or i can use also open data... these databases are HUGE but because of this have also a great amount of noise and covariates; i used for years statistical aproaches on these datasets, but to make them work i learned to use very clean samples taken by these big data. I can assure you that by doing this is possible to obtain very interesting results that average people don't see because are too lazy to create proper samples and design proper experiments. A statistical algorithm that i used very often to analyze brain imaging data was Statistical Parametric Mapping (SPM)

https://www.fil.ion.ucl.ac.uk/spm/

Why we must re-invent the wheel when we already have it? Very important developers teams already working on this software and i can assure you that their commercial counterparts (also FDA approved) are often less efficient in clinical practise and also very expensive. For example NEUROSTAT and BRASS are commercial counterpart of SPM, the three softwares performs in the same way, but SPM is open source and can be "modded" also to perform other tasks with some hacking skills, ofter is sufficient to use non-standard datasets and templates, i did this for years.

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19142712

With some "hacking skills" (not only on code, with "hacking skills" i mean any "out of line" idea) you can open new universes in image analisys without write a single line of code (or writing some few with little scripts that use API and functions from this softwares)

For example to do radiomics you can use a very simple software with an easy GUI called LifeX...or if you are able you can use also MATLAB equipped with a free library:

https://lifexsoft.org/

https://github.com/mvallieres/radiomics/tree/master/TextureToolbox

1589122966_1A8k2FFyono2dUQWKaRzsRvbXguVu.body:
58% unitary (the central governament should have more power to local to improve local wellness and regulate foreign affairs)
67% democratic (direct democracy is the best form of governament, but who have merit should guide a nation)
72% globalist (we are citizens of the world but with different cultures that should be respected individually. sometimes "globalism" become "colonialism")
60% pacifist (sometimes the force must be used to protect liberty and fight criminals)
65% freedom (you're free when you allow the others to be free...the state must guarantee this without be a dictatorship)
87% equality (private monopoly are the anti-chamber for dictatorship, expecially if manage natural monopolies like water, that should be public, but some market is useful to improve services and goods quality)
60% secular (science make our society to progress, but science cannot exclude that don't exist anything "bigger" above our universe..if you think the contrary set up an experiment to demostrate this!. also some religious people are helping other people when some ateist are very egoistic)
57% progress (good science canot be done without a good experiment design and good hypothesis, that are based on previous data. who use only inductive approaches are not a scientist)

> [kapec](#comment_42_1CQ14MAUEp55ijU6rQLQ9vZdzxCQe9s1SF): It meant that I like his selection of sites on his proxy. And was wandering if he is taking submissions for new sites (for example a blog or WebLabel) to be featured on his proxy.

I copy here the rules for hosting your zite on my new proxy (the same as the previous):

This is a preview with selected zites (all official zerotalks plus some other zites) created to show zeronet to the public. This is a read-only proxy and addictional zites cannot be added by users. Also ZeroID and login zites are blocked (you can't comment any zite by using the proxy, you should install zeronet in your pc/phone to do this). Private content zites like zeromail are also blocked.

If you want your zite added to this proxy it must respect these conditions, if this is the case post your link in a comment below:

legal content (no pedo, black markets, malware, piracy, racism, etc... the same rules of my seedbox are valid also here) no javascript cryptominers
no image previews of user generated content (example: Millchan)
no big files, no videos/audio files (this files use a large amount of bandwidth and can block the proxy)
no private content (zites like zeromail) , cannot be managed by using the proxy.
No zites that allow user login in their code without using a third part service like ZeroID (example: Millchan)

I will not discriminate any site for having different ideas from mine.

If you will see an illegal site in the proxy feel free to report it in this forum, i will remove it from the site.
